project_overview.description: A brief description of the project and its purpose.
project_overview.intended_outcomes: What the project aims to achieve.

where_we_left_off: Summary of the last session's progress or the state of the project when it was last worked on.

technical_details.architecture: Description or link to architecture diagrams.
technical_details.api_documentation: Description or link to API documentation.
technical_details.coding_standards: Description or link to coding standards.
